definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: At last, the difficulties and effect of the three methods were also analyzed and the results were given.
sentences.chinese: 对三种方法的效果和难易度进行了分析，并作出评价。

sentences.english: There is no order of difficulty in miracles.
The fuel's size also affects how easily it will catch fire .
sentences.chinese: 燃料的尺寸也影响产生火的难易度。

sentences.english: Simplicity defines the ease of understanding and reading the code.
sentences.chinese: 简单性定义了代码理解和阅读的难易程度。

sentences.english: New evidence is obtained about the degree of difficulty in reeling .
sentences.chinese: 对影响解舒的难易性提供了新的依据。

sentences.english: How do you determine when a puzzle is too difficult?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何决定一个谜题的难易程度的？

sentences.english: The process-specific time represents the difficulty of the occurrence of the process.
sentences.chinese: 过程时间表征过程发生的难易。

sentences.english: Every task has its hard and easy parts.
sentences.chinese: 每一项工作都有其难易部分。

sentences.english: Accept specific prices be based on degree of difficulty to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 具体价格也可根据难易度，再行挟商调整。

sentences.english: The texts should be graded in order of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 课文要按难易程度编排。

sentences.english: Whether the life of a servant was hard or easy depended primarily on the temperament of the taskmaster;
sentences.chinese: 服役者的生活难易主要取决于雇主的为人。

sentences.english: The seventeen judges were also asked about the ease of understanding and the sensibility of the approach.
sentences.chinese: 询问17名判断者理解的难易和结果的敏感度。

sentences.english: The amount of structural hydroxyl loss can be correlated with the crosslinking degree of AL-CLS.
sentences.chinese: 层结构羟基丢失的难易程度与交联度有关。

sentences.english: The tests in this book are arranged in order of difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的试题是按难易程度顺序排列的。

sentences.english: The third difficulty is to make her choice, and she chose the easy time.
sentences.chinese: 第三次是让她选择难易，而她选了易的时候。

sentences.english: Extensibility defines the ease with which functionality can be added to the existing code.
sentences.chinese: 可扩展性定义了向现有代码中加入功能的难易程度。

definition: height/altitude (aviation)/pitch (music)/ups and downs (success or failure)/whether sth is right or wrong/comparative strength, weight, depth, stature/(spoken interjection) anyway, whatever/eventually, in the end
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
complicated and simple/traditional and simplified form of Chinese characters
true or false?/correct or incorrect/to correct errors (in a document)
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
